description:
## Vertical Computational Grid Registration

Register a vertical computational grid definition.

Defines the vertical layer structure for a model component.

Vertical grid IDs are automatically generated.

label: Description
description: Description to distinguish this vertical grid.\n\nInclude key characteristics like number of levels and extent.
placeholder: e.g., 85-level atmospheric hybrid height coordinate extending to approximately 85 km

label: Vertical Coordinate
description:
Coordinate type for the vertical grid.

- atmosphere-hybrid-height-coordinate: Height-based hybrid
- atmosphere-hybrid-sigma-pressure-coordinate: Pressure-based hybrid
- atmosphere-sigma-coordinate: Terrain-following sigma
- depth: Ocean/soil depth
- height: Geometric height
- land-ice-sigma-coordinate: Ice sheet sigma
- ocean-s-coordinate: Ocean stretched coordinate
- ocean-sigma-z-coordinate: Ocean sigma-z hybrid

label: Number of Layers
description: Number of mass layers (grid cells) in the vertical.\n\nLeave blank if varies across physical processes or grid.

label: Layer Range
description:
Min and max layers if variable.

Format: min,max

Leave blank if n_z is provided or not applicable.

label: Top Layer Thickness
description: Thickness of the top model layer in metres.\n\nProvide nominal/representative maximum if varies.

label: Bottom Layer Thickness
description:
Thickness of the bottom model layer in metres.

Provide nominal/representative maximum if varies.

Leave blank if layer can expand (e.g., ice accumulation).

label: Total Thickness
description: Total thickness spanned by all layers in metres.\n\nProvide nominal/representative maximum if varies.

label: Issue Kind
description: Select whether this is a new submission or modification of existing entry.
